item.title: Video Editor for Educational Nature/Wild Foods Influencer - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am seeking a skilled video editor to edit short form content for our educational nature/wild foods channel on YouTube, Tik Tok, and Instagram. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing social media videos and a good understanding of making fast paced, entertaining short form content.

Responsibilities:
- Edit short form YouTube, Tik Tok, and Instagram content
- Enhance video quality and visual appeal with simple overlays - music - etc.
- Incorporate graphics, effects, and sound to enhance storytelling

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing for social media platforms
- Proficiency in video editing software - PRIMARILY interested in CapCut and Descript editing although Premiere is acceptable
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

If you have a passion for nature, wild foods, and video editing, we would love to have you on our team. This is a great opportunity to work with a growing influencer in the educational space.

Please include a link to your portfolio or previous work samples when applying.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Education, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video
Skills: Education, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video
Country: United States

item.title: Bilingual (French/English) Descript Video Editor for YouTube Content - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a skilled bilingual (French/English) video editor proficient in Descript to join our team and help create engaging YouTube content. The ideal candidate will have experience with Descript's AI-powered editing features and be able to work efficiently to produce high-quality videos in both French and English.

Responsibilities:

- Edit raw video footage using Descript, following our established SOP
- Apply appropriate templates and transitions
- Create short-form and mid-form content from longer videos
- Generate YouTube descriptions and social media posts
- Assist in creating blog content from video transcripts
- Ensure all content meets our quality standards in both French and English

Requirements:

- Fluency in both French and English
- Proficiency with Descript video editing software
- Experience with AI-powered editing tools
- Strong attention to detail and ability to follow SOPs
- Familiarity with YouTube content creation and optimization
- Excellent time management skills
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with ClickUp is mandatory
Knowledge of SEO best practices for YouTube
Background in content creation or digital marketing

Project Scope:
This is an ongoing project with regular video editing needs. We anticipate 15-20 hours of work per week, with the potential for increased hours based on performance and project needs.

To Apply, Please submit your application with:

- Your relevant experience with Descript and bilingual video editing
- A portfolio or samples of your video editing work (preferably in both French and English)

Looking forward to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Editing & Production, French, English
Skills: Video Editing, Video Editing & Production, French, English
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Amazon and Website Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to help us edit video content for our Amazon and website. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing videos for ecommerce platforms and online marketing. This is a great opportunity to showcase your editing skills and contribute to our brand's success. The responsibilities include reviewing raw footage, cutting and rearranging scenes, adding effects and transitions, and ensuring the final product meets our brand guidelines.


    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong understanding of video production principles
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Creativity in storytelling through visuals
    - Knowledge of different video formats and requirements for online platforms

    If you are passionate about creating engaging and compelling video content, we would love to hear from you. Please include samples of your previous work with your application.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, Copywriting
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, Copywriting

item.title: Real Estate Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Ad: Real Estate Video Editor (Part-Time)
Company Overview: Join our dynamic team at Amazing Photo Video, a leading real estate marketing agency dedicated to creating compelling visual content. We specialize in showcasing properties through high-quality videos that captivate audiences and drive sales.
Position: Real Estate Video Editor (Part-Time, On Call Monday to Friday)
Location: Office is located in Toronto ON - Remote Work Optional
Responsibilities:
Edit video footage and audio files to create cohesive, visually appealing videos.
Select appropriate music and add special effects to enhance video content.
Organize video and audio files for efficient editing workflow.
Color correct and grade video footage to ensure high-quality output.
Create motion graphics, titles, and other visual effects as needed.
Use Adobe editing software (e.g., Premiere Pro, After Effects) to assemble projects.
Collaborate closely with videographers and other editors to achieve project objectives.

Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing, specifically in real estate or similar industry.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Premiere Pro and After Effects.
Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently and efficiently.
Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.
Creative mindset with a passion for storytelling through video.

Additional Information:
Part-time position with flexible on-call hours, Monday to Friday.
Opportunity to work in an ambitious team environment focused on excellence.
Portfolio or examples of previous video editing work required.

If you thrive in a creative and fast-paced environment and have a passion for creating exceptional videos for online marketing purposes, we invite you to apply. Please submit your resume, portfolio (or links to previous work), and a cover letter outlining your experience and why you would be a great fit for this role.



Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Film Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Videography
Skills: Social Media Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Film Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Videography
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video de bodas - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an experienced video editor.

The work to be done will be corporate videos, weddings and more usually for Instagram reels. (If you do not accept the reel job, do not apply to the job)

Must have management of premiere and after effects for visual effects.

The budget for each corporate video is €24 and delivery must be within 7 days. (if you do not fit this budget, do not apply for the job) too 50$ FOR A PACK OF 10 REELS, and 70$ for the wedding video.

Only those who are interested in taking all the jobs should apply, if you reject one, we will discard your candidacy.

If I like the work and we have a good working relationship, you will receive more editing and also photography jobs.

Write at the beginning of the application (emocionartestudio) you can find us by that same name on the internet, also comment that you apply for professional video work.

Greetings and thanks.

Budget: $70

Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Commercial, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Commercial, Explainer Video

item.description:
Video Editor | LONG TERM | podcast- celebrities | Youtube Agency
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZpDQKmsDys

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 weekly videos of 30 minutes each, at least.
The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 120$. Monthly equals 480$.
The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

Budget: $30

item.title: Video Editing for Recorded Session - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to edit a recorded session. The footage includes presentations and discussions that need to be polished and made visually appealing.

Task Description:
The most important thing is to
- ensure the edited version only contains the course instructor teaching
- remove parts such as discussion and students' self-introduction
- only show the presentation window or the instructor's face, do not show the learners' faces.
- Enhance the video quality so it's clear and easy to follow

Skills required:
- Video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Audio editing
- Knowledge of video formats and codecs
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Education, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Education, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Expert Deepfake Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Deepfake Video Creator to join our team for a specialized project. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in creating realistic and high-quality deepfake videos, with a portfolio to demonstrate their expertise.

Responsibilities:

Develop and produce deepfake videos based on provided scripts and requirements.
Ensure high-quality and realistic video output.
Work collaboratively with our team to understand project goals and deliverables.
Manage and optimize deepfake algorithms and models for best performance.
Provide regular updates and incorporate feedback as necessary.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating deepfake videos.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous deepfake projects.
Proficiency with deepfake software and tools (e.g., DeepFaceLab, FaceSwap, etc.).
Solid understanding of machine learning and AI techniques related to deepfake technology.
Excellent attention to detail and a creative mindset.
Strong communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with video editing and post-production.
Knowledge of ethical considerations and legal implications surrounding deepfake technology.
Ability to troubleshoot and solve technical issues independently.
Application Requirements:

Updated resume.
Portfolio of previous deepfake video projects.
References from past clients or employers.
Project Details:

Project-based contract with potential for future collaboration.
Competitive compensation based on experience and project scope.
Flexible working hours with clear project deadlines.
If you have a passion for innovative video technology and the skills to create compelling deepfake videos, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your resume, portfolio, and references.

We look forward to your application!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: NLD
click to apply

item.title: Edicion simple de videos para Youtube (Spanish video editing for Youtube) - Upwork
item.description:
Hola chicos! Busco un editor para mis videos de Youtube  (vlogs de viaje y actividades)

La frecuencia deseada es de 1 edicion de video por semana, con el deseo de llegar a producir 2 prontamente, dependiendo de como trabajemos juntos.

El objetivo a largo plazo es poder dedicarme solo a Youtube y contratar a alguien a tiempo completo para edicion de videos (todos los dias) entre otras actividades.

Los videos típicamente durarán entre 18-40 minutos. Por ahora y mientras establezco mi canal de Youtube, el pago ofrecido es de $10 por video independientemente de la duración.

Responsabilidades:
- Llevar a cabo una edición básica en  que incluya cortes de escenas y ajuste de color

- Tener un buen nivel de inglés, ya que algunos videos pueden ser con personas de habla inglesa, por lo que es fundamental comprender lo que se dice para hacer los cortes adecuadamente y poder subtitular al espanol

- Entregar los proyectos a tiempo

- Incluir la frase "dale pues" en tu aplicacion para saber que leiste todo

- Aca pueden ver ejemplos de mis videos finalizado (correccion de color/cortes simples/subtitulaje)
https://www.youtube.com/@melaniebrecht/videos

Si te animas, aplica y empecemos esta misma semana con el primer video

Gracias por tu tiempo!

/////////////////////////

Hello everyone! I'm looking for an editor for my YouTube videos (travel vlogs and activities).

The desired frequency is one video edit per week, with the goal of producing two videos soon, depending on how well we work together.

The long-term goal is to be able to dedicate myself solely to YouTube and hire someone full-time for video editing (every day) among other activities.

The videos will typically last between 18-40 minutes. For now, while I establish my YouTube channel, the payment offered is $10 per video regardless of the duration.

Responsibilities:

Perform basic editing, including scene cuts and color correction
Have a good level of English, as some videos may include English-speaking people, so it's essential to understand what is being said to make the cuts appropriately and subtitle in Spanish
Deliver projects on time
Include the phrase "dale pues" in your application to show that you read everything
Here you can see examples of my finished videos (color correction/simple cuts/subtitling)
https://www.youtube.com/@melaniebrecht/videos
If you're interested, apply and let's start this week with the first video.

Thank you for your time!










Budget: $10
Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, YouTube
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, YouTube
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create captivating and appealing reels for our Instagram channel. As a video editor, you will be provided with the footage and your task will be to create enticing storylines that engage and attract our audience. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and be proficient in video editing software. Experience in editing content specifically for Instagram reels is highly preferred.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit and enhance raw footage to create visually appealing reels
    - Develop creative and engaging storylines to captivate our audience
    - Ensure the final videos meet our brand aesthetics and quality standards

    Skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong understanding of storytelling and visual composition
    - Attention to detail and ability to work with tight deadlines
    - Familiarity with Instagram's video format and trends

    This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level video editor who can bring their creativity and expertise to elevate our Instagram channel.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Urgent Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
We are urgently looking for an expert editor to make an urgent video for us. I will not recommend any freshers to apply, we already face tribble service from a fresher.
It would be social media reel video but we will upload it on our social media platforms. Like facebook, IG, LinkedIn.
You have the freedom to be creative but make sure it looks elegant and clean.

The video duration could be 20 to 30 sec max less to than 1 min. You can use any stock elements or footage or music however make sure those are copyright free.
If you have any ideas feel free to share. Also if you have any question let me know.

We will pay 7$ per 20-30 sec reel, if its more than 30 sec then 13$. More than 1 min will be based on negotiation.
Apply only if you are ready to work in this budget otherwise thank you.

Start your application with the word "Dedicated"


Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Video Commercial, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Digital Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Concept Video, Video Commercial, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Digital Video, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
